The announcement arrived only minutes before the search giant's first earnings call of 2011-- and boy oh boy, the executive shakeup had nothing to do with earnings. We've had a very strong quarter, said Eric Schmidt , referencing the company's revenues of$ 8.44 billion, up 26% year-over-year. Eric Schmidt has been CEO for nearly a decade. IT involved. SharePoint is a great bridge for that," said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek. When asked what SharePoint brings to the table that other Web development platforms don't, Steve Ballmer responded Well, you can do anything with anything. The question is, how much work is it? What we're trying to do is essentially give the people who build these sites a higher-level set of tools, so they're not reinventing the wheel. Can we provide infrastructure that ties in and lets the end user participate, and is done in a very high-quality, finished way for those folks? And we think the answer is yes. Steve Ballmer 's keynote also discussed Microsoft's commitment to SharePoint in the cloud. The company already has more than one million users signed up for SharePoint Online, a hosted version of the software. SharePoint Online
